name: OneSeriousProblem
description:
One Serious Problem

There's only one serious problem, and that is ___. You can sit, walk, think, or leave the room. But you can never turn back once you exit the game. 

This is the No.2 of my five minutes game project.

Control
  • `WASD` + `Space`
Known Issue(s)
  • The game is intended to delete itself after you exit, but on Windows it doesn't do due to system restrictions. I haven't figured out the solution.
References

Music: Eden, Gondwana Records, 2020. (source not included)

Fonts: Fira Code, Rubik Mono.

Made over Dec 7th, 2020 night.
